EmailTemplate.name: NUR-2021FY-EM-Broker-Nurture.nurture-12
EmailTemplate.subject: $0 visit fees for virtual services
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Virtual care that spans the full continuum of care Designed to serve the unique needs of small businesses and their employees, our HealthiestYou Complete Bundle offers access to all virtual care services and tools with a $0 visit fee. Beyond just the cost savings, our platform is intuitive and easy to use, making tasks like consulting with a doctor, talking to a therapist or comparing local prescription prices a snap. HealthiestYou Complete Bundle $0 visit fee covers - Dermatology - Expert Medical Services - Find a Provider - General Medical - Intelligent Alerts - Mental Health - Neck and Back Care - Nutrition - Price Transparency Tools About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
